segments.text: We cannot avoid being asked questions in the interview . Sometimes , my mind goes blank .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is so terrible to be caught unaware .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Admittedly , you can get prepared in advance for the interview , but you cannot cover everything concerned .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . So you should know how to deal with the probable questions and then make flexible reply .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Firstly , your answer should go straight to the point , and be clear and brief .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: State your opinion or argument first , and then go on with details .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Never should you give an answer completely beside the point .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you indeed don't know how to answer , admit it frankly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Pretending to know when you do not know may expose yourself to ridicule .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Confirm the question if you don't catch it clearly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Try to avoid the possible duplicate answer if you can .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It can help you leave a deep impression on the interviewer .
segments.speaker: S2
